attributes.action: learning about Epilepsy compulsary by neurologists go into Schools & workplaces
attributes.additional_details: I was just a regular person in secondary school had friends, was happy then my life changed at 14 i had my first seizure in History sent my mother called out of work to take me GPS then went sleep i lost alot of education. Science was the worse was told i was going to die by a pupil. teacher saying just leave her there im fully concuous. I lost my friends used as a lab rat on medications Ive been mistaken for beeing drunk, new borns babies parents go home to give information on what to do.
attributes.background: Make compulsary in First Aid & educating children adults & families know what to do when a seizure starts. Some can have 1 at any time seizure and not have epilepsy. And also babies have different first aid for seizure(s) and to give the first aid on what to do if a seizure occures when they go home

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for training in workplaces, which is a matter for individual employers.

We could accept a petition calling for epilepsy to be taught about in schools, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
